description: A new species of Gymnanthemum (Compositae, Vernonieae) from South Africa is described. It can be distinguished from other species in the genus by the five-flowered capitula and widely obtuse leaf blades.

creator.affiliation: Smithsonian Institution, Washington, DC, United States of America
creator.name: Robinson, Harold

creator.affiliation: Smithsonian Institution, Washington DC, United States of America
creator.name: Funk, Vicki

headline: Gymnanthemum koekemoerae (Compositae, Vernonieae), a new species from South Africa
name: Gymnanthemum koekemoerae (Compositae, Vernonieae), a new species from South Africa
